title: Nwada001
author: Nwada001
content: I tried going through the forum as usual, with different tabs all open at the same time. This error message just popped up almost twice today, which is the first time I have experienced that. Is there a limit to how many threads one can open at once?Has anyone encountered such an error before?

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: When I was using a browser that can open many tabs that I have opened before and not close, opening the browser and opening multiple threads automatically on this forum at once will cause that. Now that I use browser that only the tab I clicked on will open, I do not get the error anymore. This is not new too. There are different threads about this question in the past.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Never experienced this before, but many has. Just avoid opening multiple threads at once, especially if its more than 10 already. Why you end up opening multiple threads btw

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: It has happened before to some users, which means there are certain limits you might have exceeded. You could get some of the answers in any of the threadsLegendary jail: Too fast / overloaded (503)Bitcointalk Error Page I keep getting a 503 error

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on July 31, 2023, 11:48:21 PMIt has happened before to some users, which means there are certain limits you might have exceeded. You could get some of the answers in any of the threadsLegendary jail: Too fast / overloaded (503)Bitcointalk Error Page I keep getting a 503 errorThis is helpful, as I never knew the cause of that, but your links confirmed that many have experienced that before. I even think some of my installed tools, which I use to extract information for marketing from some sites, led to this.Â I will lock the thread now as it has served its purpose.
